hello_message:
I'm a bot for generating test users, files, credit cards and texts. Always ready to save your testing time.

Choose exactly what you need to generate 👇
query_error: Sorry, I don't understand your query, try again.
generator_again: If you need more data, select again 👇
users_generator: Got it, let's generate test users. Choose how many users you want 👇
users_generator_error: This is beyond my capacity. I can only generate 15 users at a time. Try again.
files_generator: Got it. I can generate files of various extensions from 1 byte up to 45 megabytes. Choose the extension you need 👇
files_generator_size: Last step left! Write the size of the file. I only accept integers, no spaces or other characters. ⛔️Size limits: Minimum — 1 byte Maximum — 45 MB (that's 46,080 KB or 47,185,920 bytes)
files_generator_unit: Now choose a unit of measure. A little size guide: 1 kilobyte = 1,024 bytes 1 megabyte = 1,024 kilobytes = 1,048,576 bytes
files_generator_ext_error: You may have chosen the wrong file extension, please choose one from the menu below 👇
files_generator_unit_error: You may have selected the wrong unit of measurement, please choose one from the menu below 👇
files_generator_size_error: Incorrect file size. Please enter the correct one, I only accept positive integers, no spaces or other characters 🙂
files_generator_big_file: The file size is beyond my capacity. ⛔️ Size limits: Minimum — 1 byte Maximum — 45 MB (that's 46,080 KB or 47,185,920 bytes) Please enter the appropriate size 🙂
cards_generator: Got it, let's generate the test bank card details. Select the payment system you need 👇
text_generator:
Got it! I can generate text from 1 up to 4000 characters.

Please enter an integer without spaces or other characters 👇
text_generator_int_error: Wrong number of characters. Please enter the correct one, I only accept positive integers from 1 to 4000, no spaces or other characters 🙂
text_generator_size_error: The number of characters is beyond my capacity. Please enter the correct one, I only accept positive integers from 1 to 4000, no spaces or other characters 🙂
text_generator_again: If you need more data, enter an integer from 1 up to 4000 again 👇
